璒字的基本解释

璒
dēng
似玉的美石。

璒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dēng］
［《廣韻》都滕切，平登，端。］
(1)似玉的美石。
(2)多用作人名。隋有徐璒。见《隋书》本传。

璒字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璒； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页741第26
【唐韻】【集韻】?都騰切，音登。【說文】石之似玉者。

Jing
Basic explanation of words
Jing
dēng
Beautiful stone like jade.
Jing
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dēng］
["Guangyun" all Tengqie, Ping Deng, Duan. ]
(1) Beautiful stone like jade.
(2) Use more as a person's name. There is Xu Jing in the Sui Dynasty. See the biography of "Sui Shu".
Jing
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璒; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 741 26
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? All Tengqie, Yin Deng. [Said the text] The stone is like jade.
